type.name: Default
type.summary: Williams' Alligator is an indicator that transposes multiple moving averages, showing chart patterns that Bill Williams compared to an alligator's feeding habits when describing market movement. See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.

type.name: Main
type.summary: Williams' Alligator is an indicator that transposes multiple moving averages, showing chart patterns that Bill Williams compared to an alligator's feeding habits when describing market movement. See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window for the Alligator's Jaw.
Number of periods to use for smoothing for the Alligator's Jaw.
Number of periods in the lookback window for the Alligator's Teeth.
Number of periods to use for smoothing for the Alligator's Teeth.
Number of periods in the lookback window for the Alligator's Lips.
Number of periods to use for smoothing for the Alligator's Lips.
